alert.note: Alert for Gila (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 04 at 6:01AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL AT LEAST UNTIL 2 PM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by rain and snowmelt continues. * WHERE...A portion of east central Arizona, including the following county, Gila. * WHEN...Until at least 200 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Flooding on portions of Tonto Creek through Tonto Basin. Low water crossings may not be passable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 600 AM MST, a streamflow gauge on Tonto Creek, upstream from Tonto Basin, measured 6.14 feet. Low water crossings in Tonto Basin, including A Crossing, Bar X Crossing, Greenback Crossing, and Store Crossing may not be passable with this type of flow. Flooding is expected to continue through next week due to continued snow melt and additional rainfall. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Tonto Basin. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
